name: Half a Soul Away
description:
🍄🌳 Travelling magically between two worlds 

In this puzzle game, Gi traverses the Overworld and Soulworld on a quest to find her mom. 
What obstacles does she encounter along the way?


🍀 Danny Bouchard - programmer and level designer

🌼 Sharon Ku - artist and UI designer

🎶 Sol Paul - sound designer
